title: WEFTshop
subtitle:
These beauties are the shuttles used on our big looms in Karenni refugee camp and Um Phiem Mai refugee camp to weave our fabric for our textile jewellery.

title: Dr Stephen Clarke
subtitle: #OTD 75 years ago (31 Oct 1944) PM Peter Fraser welcomes over 800 Polish refugee children and carers to New Zealand. Next day trained to new home at Pahīatua’s ‘Little Poland’ camp.
